title: Quarkus Newsletter #29 - February
content: Read the February newletter to get the latest articles, blogs and insights on Quarkus. Read "Deploy serverless Java apps with Quarkus on Azure Functions" to learn about Quarkus Funqy and its built-in support for the Azure Functions HTTP trigger for Java by Glenn Gailey, Christopher McClister, Daniel Oh, Carolyn McSharry,...
